data.title: JFH News: Meredith Andrews Tunes Her Heart To The Sound of Eternity on New Live Project, "Heaven's Frequency"
data.text:
Curb Records Artist Meredith Andrews Tunes Her Heart To The Sound of Eternity on New Live Project, "Heaven's Frequency," Out Today (3/22)

New Live Performance Video of Title-Cut Also Premieres Today

NEWS SOURCE: Curb Records

March 22, 2024

Nashville, Tenn. (March 22, 2024) — Curb Records recording artist Meredith Andrews tunes her heart to the sound of eternity on new live project, Heaven’s Frequency, out today (3/22) — listen HERE. Additionally, Andrews premieres the live performance video for the title-cut — watch HERE.

Recorded in her hometown of Nashville at HopeUC, the original live set showcases the genuine anointing and bold authority Andrews harnesses as she leads a room full of worshipers to the throne of God. From regal declarations like “The Lamb, The Lion, The King” to abiding affirmations of His faithfulness like “Always Do,” Heaven’s Frequency boasts authentic moments of spontaneous praise, passionate pleas for breakthrough and notable collaborations with Patrick Mayberry and Cecily. The 10-song album was produced by the Dove Award-winning artist’s husband, Jacob Sooter (Brandon Lake, Passion).

In support of the fresh collection, Andrews filmed exclusive content for CCLI SongSelect and MultiTracks.com, where worship leaders interested in leading her songs at their local church can also find additional resources. Moreover, she’s recently appeared on popular worship leader podcast “The Table,” as well as “The Story Chorus Podcast” with Jordan Loftis and the “Worship Circle” podcast, while serving as a worship leader coach for Worship Circle for seven years.

Andrews will bring fresh originals and signature songs from her rich catalog to cities across the U.S. throughout the year. The sought-after worship leader, mentor and teacher has a full tour itinerary planned for 2024 that includes women’s events, worship conferences and her own nights of worship.

Stream or purchase Heaven’s Frequency HERE. For more information and a full list of tour dates, visit www.meredithandrews.com.

Heaven’s Frequency Tracklisting:

1. “Let Everything (feat. Patrick Mayberry)” (Meredith Andrews, Patrick Mayberry, Jacob Sooter)

2. “Always Do” (Meredith Andrews, Mitch Wong, Mia Fieldes, Jacob Sooter)

3. “The Lamb, The Lion, The King” (Meredith Andrews, Ethan Hulse, Jacob Sooter)

4. “No Weapon” (Meredith Andrews, Rebekah White, Jess Soccorsi, Andrew Bergthold, Jacob Sooter)

5. “Safe Place” (Meredith Andrews, Kailey Ligon, Jacob Sooter)

6. “Over and Over” (Meredith Andrews, Sarah Reeves, Max Corwin, Jacob Sooter)

7. “Heaven’s Frequency (feat. Cecily)” (Meredith Andrews, Robby Busick, Cecily Hennigan)

8. “What He’s Done” (Anna Golden, Tasha Cobbs Leonard, Kristian Stanfill, Jacob Sooter)

9. “One Word” (Meredith Andrews, Mia Fieldes, Jacob Sooter)

10. “Yeshua (Holy)” (Meredith Andrews, Rebekah White, Jacob Sooter)

About Meredith Andrews:

Curb Records recording artist Meredith Andrews is passionate about writing and leading songs that keep people’s hearts and minds set on Jesus. Over the course of her career, the Dove Award-winning artist has been using her musical gifts, love for God, and her huge heart for His people to teach and remind us all about the enormity of our awesome and loving Savior. Andrews was previously part of the Vertical Worship team, and more recently The Belonging Co., her home church in Nashville. As a gifted songwriter and recording artist, she has been a part of multiple songs sung by churches across America such as “Open Up The Heavens,” “Lamb of God,” “Not For A Moment,” “Spirit of the Living God,” and “Faith and Wonder.” Andrews often leads worship at major women’s and worship leader conferences across the U.S., and has toured with Matt Maher, Natalie Grant, Big Daddy Weave, Vertical Worship, Phil Wickham, and Michael W. Smith, among others. Meredith will release new music in 2024 starting with “The Lamb, The Lion, The King” on January 19, 2024, followed by “Always Do” on February 16, 2024, culminating in her new album release, Heaven’s Frequency, available now.

About Curb Records:

Celebrating 60 years in business, Curb Records is one of the world’s leading independent music companies. Owned and operated by Mike Curb since 1964, Curb Records has achieved 435 number one records, over 1,500 Top Ten records and charted over 4,500 total records. With over a half century in operation, Curb Records has been influential in the careers of some of the biggest names in music, including: Tim McGraw, Hank Williams Jr., Rodney Atkins, Lee Brice, LeAnn Rimes, The Judds, Dylan Scott, Sawyer Brown, for KING & COUNTRY, Wyn Starks, Kelsey Hart, Dan Bremnes, We Are Messengers, Wynonna, Lyle Lovett, Big Daddy Weave, Natalie Grant, Jo Dee Messina, Hannah Ellis, Mo Pitney, Hal Ketchum, and Desert Rose Band, among many others.

###

For more info on Meredith Andrews, visit the JFH Artists Database.
